title: Populate product catalog with many unique tech/gadget products

requirements.text: Populate the PRODUCTS array in ProductCatalog.tsx with at least 40 unique tech/gadget products spanning a wide variety of categories (e.g., smartphones, laptops, wearables, audio, smart home, gaming, photography, networking, accessories, drones, VR/AR, health tech, robotics, e-readers). Each product must have a unique id, name, description, price, category, image placeholder or emoji, and a rating.

quotes: add as many unique teach/gadget products

acceptanceCriteria: At least 40 distinct products are present in the PRODUCTS array
Products span at least 8 different categories
Each product has a unique id, name, short description, numeric price, category string, and rating value
No duplicate product names exist in the catalog
All products are visible and filterable in the catalog grid on the frontend
Category filter chips correctly filter the expanded product list

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ (immutable paths)
All product data must remain in the frontend PRODUCTS array â€” do not route it through the backend
nonGoals: Adding new backend endpoints or modifying the Motoko actor for product data
Implementing a CMS or admin UI for adding products
Changing the existing catalog UI layout or filtering/sorting logic
Adding real product images (placeholder values or emojis are acceptable)
